import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { loginAction } from "../../redux/Actions/ClientAction"; import "./ModalLogin.css"; import { useFormik } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import { clientService } from "../../services"; export default function ModalSignIn() { const initialValues = { email: "", client_password: "", }; const onSubmit = (values, onSubmitProps) => { console.log("value submit: ", values); onSubmitProps.setSubmitting(false); clientService .login(values) .then((res) => { console.log("data login to server", res.data); localStorage.setItem(ACCESS_TOKEN, result.data.accessToken); localStorage.setItem(USER_LOGIN, JSON.stringify(result.data)); props.history.push("/"); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; const validationSchema = Yup.object({ client_password: Yup.string().required("Required"), email: Yup.string().required("Required").email("Invalid email format"), }); const formik = useFormik({ initialValues, onSubmit, validationSchema, // only show validate when press button submit form validateOnBlur: false, validateOnChange: false, }); console.log(("form errors", formik.errors)); return ( <>
{/* Button trigger modal */} {/* Modal */}

Welcome back!

{/* email */}

{formik.errors.email}

) : null}
{/* password */}
{formik.errors.client_password ? (

{formik.errors.client_password}

) : null}
Forgot password?
{/* end */}
); }
